title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
**Product Name:** Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count

Experience the excellence of craftsmanship with our Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils! These pencils are a testament to over 100 years of tradition and quality, making them a preferred choice among teachers.

**Product Details:**

- **Graphite Formula:** Our pencils feature an exclusive #2 graphite formula, ensuring smooth and effortless writing. The thick graphite core guarantees consistent and uniform lines with every stroke.

- **Wood Quality:** The pencils are encased in premium wood, harvested responsibly from managed forests. This commitment to quality and sustainability is reflected in the luxurious feel and sturdy build of each pencil.

- **Finish:** The pencils boast a golden yellow lacquered finish with a matte coating, providing a comfortable grip and a touch of sophistication.

- **Pre-Sharpened:** Each pencil comes pre-sharpened, saving you time and ensuring you're ready to write or draw right out of the box.

- **Eraser:** The latex-free eraser is not only safe but also incredibly effective. It removes marks completely without smudging, thanks to its smudge-free performance. The eraser is secured with a signature green & gold ferrule, adding a touch of elegance to each pencil.

- **Safety:** Our pencils are PMA certified non-toxic, ensuring safety for all users.

- **Brand:** Ticonderoga, a part of the Dixon Ticonderoga family, is a name synonymous with quality and tradition in the world of stationery. The brand is associated with a range of other trusted names like Prang, Pacon, Tru-Ray, UCreate, Fadeless, Classroom Keepers, Bordette, Creativity Street, Spectra, Strathmore, Canson, Daler-Rowney, Lyra, Das, Maimeri, and Princeton Artist Brush.

With Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, you're not just buying a pencil, but a century-old tradition of quality and craftsmanship. Experience the difference today!
